system.name: Sneak Attack
system.effect:
Target: Your Dark-Type Pokémon
Effect: While this Feature is bound, when attacking foes that are Fainted, Flanked, Flinched, Sleeping, Stuck, Tripped, unaware of your Pokémon’s presence, or otherwise do not expect an attack, the target gains a +2 bonus to Accuracy Rolls and a bonus to Damage Rolls equal to your Type-Linked Skill Rank.
system.prerequisites: Clever Ruse, Type-Linked Skill at Adept
